newsitem.title: ZIMBABWE: Zimbabwe gets first private Sunday newspaper.
newsitem.headline: Zimbabwe gets first private Sunday newspaper.

text.p: Zimbabwe got its first privately owned Sunday newspaper with the debut on the newstands on Sunday of the Zimbabwe Standard.

The Zimbabwe Standard is published by a local private company, Standard Press Limited owned by veteran publisher Clive Murphy. The company also publishes a weekly, The Zimbabwe Independent, which has established a reputation of fierce criticism of the government of President Robert Mugabe.
The Standard becomes the southern African country's second Sunday newspaper after the official Sunday Mail.
